classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: ECON201, or ECON222.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B3, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, F, and GE Elective (Area C or D). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Divsion, D, or E.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR course or GWR exam can go here. Refer to the current catalog for prerequisites.

Any Concentration Approved Elective course can go here.

8 units required. 4 units must be upper-division. See the catalog for course options. Consultation with an advisor is recommended. No double-counting with Support.
